title: Chicago's Gay, Black, Female Mayor
description:
Lori Lightfoot just made history, becoming Chicago’s first gay, black, female mayor. 
Alexis Benveniste chatted with Dick Simpson, a Lightfoot campaign aid and political science professor at the University of Illinois in Chicago.
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by Alexis Benveniste (@apbenven), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
itunes:subtitle: with Dick Simpson (University of Illinois Professor)
